name: Flapjack Fridays
description:
A fun experiment creating a full app for release on the Google & Apple App Stores with Ads and In App Purchases.

Created by Sabastian Peters and Ethan Schellenberg of Beast Powered

The more flapjacks that you can strategically stack before everything falls, the higher score you get. When it looks like your tower might fall, just use some syrup to keep everything in place!

How many flapjacks can you stack before it falls?
